description: You like snowy buttes and you cannot lie. These burley winter boots are ready to trudge to the snow-covered lookout, to the shed for firewood, or keep you warm as you wait for the bus. Constructed from waterproof leather and lined with thick wool and fleece, the Butte boots will stand up to winter's worst.Waterproof leather uppers over a waterproof bootie, sealing out the elements.17mm soft wool and lyocell UGGplush™ lining and 8mm Sherpa fleece elsewhere make this boot is nice and warm.7mm UGGplush insole is soft and cozy.Protective rubber rand and heel cup add reinforcement where it is needed it most.Supportive EVA midsole.Grippy Vibram® outsole offers great traction on challenging winter terrain.
name: UGG Butte Waterproof Chelsea Winter Boots - Men's
